snippet: The Farruco family, Gypsy dancers from Spain, performed at the Skirball Center on Sunday as part of the World Music Institute’s Flamenco Festival Gitano.
abstract: Brian Seibert reviews flamenco performance by Spanish Gypsy dancers the Farruco Family, as part of the World Music Institute's Flamenco Festival Gitano.
lead_paragraph: The Farruco family, Gypsy dancers from Spain, performed at the Skirball Center on Sunday as part of the World Music Institute’s Flamenco Festival Gitano.

headline.seo: The Farruco Family Dance Flamenco at the Skirball Center
headline.main: Fire in the Blood and Speed in the Footwork
headline.print_headline: Fire in the Blood and Speed in the Footwork
